org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.rest

Class TokenResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.oauth2.rest.TokenResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider
    Deprecated. 
    To request access tokens use @TokenEndpointResource endpoint To revoke tokens use TokenRevocationResource endpoint

    @Deprecated
public class TokenResource
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.CollectionResourceProvider
    This end point is deprecated as this does not support stateless token check.
